feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 07:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
